content: Bernie believes in creating a strong, educated workforce by providing a free college education.
subcontent: How? By reforming the student loan system to stop taking advantage of students. Also, by taxing Wall Street and ensuring that colleges are accountable for providing quality education to students.

content: Bernie's message has been consistent for 4 decades.
subcontent: Bernie has always been sticking up for the working class and the interests of the common voter. Not for special interests.
